name: Alliance Resource Partners, L.P.
description: Alliance Resource Partners, L.P. is one of the largest producers and marketers of coal in the United States. Founded in 1971, the company is based in Tulsa, Oklahoma, and operates through subsidiaries in the mining and marketing of coal. ARLP primarily produces high-quality bituminous coal from its underground mining operations across the Illinois Basin and the Appalachian region. The company focuses on delivering reliable and cost-effective coal solutions to an array of customers, including electric utilities, industrial customers, and international markets. In recent years, ARLP has strategically diversified its operations by investing in renewable energy projects and other non-coal ventures, aligning with the industry's shift toward cleaner energy solutions. The company is committed to sustainability and has implemented various environmental initiatives to minimize its ecological footprint. With a strong operational focus, Alliance Resource Partners aims to maximize shareholder value while adapting to the evolving energy landscape.
